decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Other than as varied by condition numbered 2, the development shall be retained in accordance with the following approved plans:
001, 002, 009
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 2 - The flank walls of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall be rendered to match the front of the existing building. This should be carried out within three months of the date of this permission. 

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area and to represent a reasonable period of time to regularise the existing development in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 3 - The existing outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied or used at any time as a separate residential unit and shall remain in an incidental use to the host dwellinghouse at 73 Hampden Road, Harrow, HA3 5PS. Any other material change of use would require planning permission.
 
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey outbuilding in rear garden (retrospective)
